Title: Custom SharePoint Workflow Starting Event Handlers
Description: Allow more control over when and how workflows are started.  Allows anonymous users to start workflows.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Allow more control over when and how workflows are started. Allows anonymous users to start workflows.

First release is availible along with installation instructions. The event receiver starts workflows anonymously using a fairly long list of events. There is a web part included for adding/removing receviers.

Possible features for future releases:

Ability to only have users in a certain group or with a certain role assignment start workflows.
